channel.title: Downloading java 6.0
channel.description:
when im trying to make my own server and client i finish the coding and i try compile it but it says i dont have JDK 6.0 or 5.0 ive gone on the site and looked through all ur posts but ic ant find anywhere to download it, ive downloaded JDK update 10 but it still says the same thing
any1 got any advice or help plz?

item.title: Downloading java 6.0
item.dc:creator: @icevfire icevfire
item.description:
@icevfire wrote:

i think ive found the path but when i click it it wont let me edit it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2008, 01:26:05 pm[/size][hr]is it control panel > system and maintenance > edit enviroment variables for your account.
Cos thats where i went to but it wont let me edit…

@echo off
Title xeonrs compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

thats my compiler ^ when i run it this comes up saying ive got 100 errors in like client.java and loads of other of the files is that my error or an error in the client/server i downloaded?

Then i tried on another server and it says compiled succesfully then i press run and it goes back to saying i dont have JDK 5.0 or 6.0

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading java 6.0
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

here use this one:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

it shud work and if it doesnt

use this one:

@echo off
Title xeonrs compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

change the 10 to ur type of java so if u have jdk6u7 ull change the 10 to 7

jdk1.6.0_10 to jdk1.6.0_7 ok? do that and it shud work

PS: ty d r u g for compiler

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

steps-

My Computer>System Propertys>Advanced>Enviroment Settings(or w.e idk im on a diff comp)> look for path and change it to "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe"

also try without the " im not sure yet because im on a diff comp if it doesn’t work contact me tomorrow

item.title: Downloading java 6.0
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

Ok so go to ur compiler, right-click then edit, then replace the crap inside there with this:

@echo off Title xeonrs compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
and ps. you dont need a no-ip to compile

delete all the stuff thats in that and copy nd paste this into that compiler,

Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

it should work, i aint sure about the client compiler, ow and anyway im not sure if u do compiler for the client u can just run it and its done,…
